decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (AP(04)1503 Rev P01, dated 29.07.14, received 01/08/2014, Design and Access Statement, no date, received 01/08/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The additional floorspace created by the proposal hereby approved shall be use for storage purposes ancillary to Units 26 and 27 only and shall not be used as retail floorspace unless agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
description: Construction of a mezzanine floor for storage use to the shop
